    public class SimpleClient
extends Object
implements Client
    Provide a client to simplify information retrieval over the NDN network.

      • getAsync

        public Future<net.named_data.jndn.Data> getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                        net.named_data.jndn.Interest interest)
        Asynchronously request the Data for an Interest. This will send the Interest and return immediately; use futureData.get() to block until the Data returns (see FutureData) or manage the event processing independently.
        Specified by:

      • getAsync

        public Future<net.named_data.jndn.Data> getAsync(net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                                        net.named_data.jndn.Name name)
        Synchronously retrieve the Data for a Name using a default interest (e.g. 2 second timeout); this will block until complete (i.e. either data is received or the interest times out).
        Parameters:
